divs: Sighting Detailssaw a light that was red in the sky Than I took my ipod out and began to record the redoubt was not visible whe recording but I recorded any way while I was recording the red light would shape shift and dissapearing and reappear I was looking army iPod to see if I was catching anything but I saw nothing when I played the video I caught something better that I was unable to see while recording I recorded a white light moving and turning fast and dissapearing and reapearing the video was taking while I was on the highway and. My wife driving. I was exited to see it because I think I have witnessed them befor and this time I had a camera
Summary: Sash usual lights filmed nothing showed while shooting but something showed up while Observing the video
